item.title: Do You REALLY Need GraphQL? How to Decide Between tRPC and GQL - YouTube
item.description: Do You REALLY Need GraphQL? How to Decide Between tRPC and GQL - YouTube You often want a [[GraphQL]] god to make sure [[GraphQL]] [[API]] is good Many companies do GraphQL wrong It’s very easy to do bad See the GitHub GraphQL API [[GraphQL]] is [[REST]] with extra steps [[tRPC]] is the barebones Start with [[REST]], then ask yourself if you need more complex for [[GraphQL]] or more barebones [[tRPC]] [[tRPC]] works better in a [[Monorepo]] References (References:: Do You REALLY Need GraphQL?
